channel.title: Open Liberty on Brighton JUG
channel.description: Recent content in Open Liberty on Brighton JUG

item.title: Thriving in the cloud - Venturing beyond the 12 factors - Grace Jansen and Yasmin Aumeeruddy
item.description: Thriving in the cloud: Venturing beyond the 12 factors with Grace Jansen and Yasmin Aumeeruddy We are very excited to welcome Grace Jansen and Yasmin Aumeeruddy on their Open Liberty tour. They will be giving a workshop on Thriving in the cloud: Venturing beyond the 12 factors: Enabling applications to really thrive (and not just survive) in cloud environments can be challenging. The original 12 factor app methodology helped to lay out some of the key characteristics needed for cloud-native applications… but… as our cloud infrastructure and tooling has progressed, so too have these factors.
